# kong-gateway_mtls_auth (Resource)

MTLSAuth Resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "kong-gateway_mtls_auth" "my_mtlsauth" {
  ca_certificate = {
    id = "...my_id..."
  }
  consumer = {
    id = "...my_id..."
  }
  consumer_id  = "f28acbfa-c866-4587-b688-0208ac24df21"
  created_at   = 7
  id           = "...my_id..."
  subject_name = "...my_subject_name..."
  tags = [
    "..."
  ]
}
```
